answers.answer: It depends on when the ba y wants to come.

Size of the baby doesn't matter. Everyone is different and every pregnancy is different it depends on when your body is ready. Doctors normally that siblings should be close in weight when born as long as there are no complications and so on.

The size of the baby is more likely determined by what size you and your partner were at birth. I was 8lb7oz at 2 weeks overdue and my hubby was 7lb8oz 1 week overdue. Our daughter was 8lb 9oz 6days overdue. The only factors that may change that are excessive weight gain, gestational diabetes, and preeclampsia.

question: Do small or big babies come early, late or on time? What's your experience?  My son was born 41+2. I was induced and he was 7lb. 9 oz. I'm 38 weeks with a baby girl who has been measuring small. She was 5lbs 2oz at 37 weeks.
title: Do big or small babies come earlier,  late or on time?
